name: Batshit Beavers
description:
"When two powerful colonies share the same mud-lands; It is inevitable that trees will fall and buckteeth sharpened" -- Lord Overbite.

Take hold of your own colony of Beavers in a this PVP-style clicker game. To win, simply DAM your opponent!

Once entering the game and finding a formidable opponent, collect resources to out expanding your opposition. Then use your overwhelming beaver-power to build the ultimate DAM to drown your opponent.

Controls: Everything.

Purpose: Beavers.

Note: Multiplier game that holds at 10 lobbies with 2 players each.

Note: If you do not have any friends this game may be hard to play.

Note: Based on the tragedy of Buckio and Chewiet.

Created By:

FoneE -- “You know... hoover dam was my idea.”

monnettie -- *Cat :3*
